DENOUNCE_DESCRIPTION_1: As the main developer of this website (hangame.app) takes part in the enjoyment and entertainment by using artificial intelligence (developed by co:here) as the fundamental basis of the game for the generation of words, I am aware that sometimes it can generate inappropriate words or incorrect.
DENOUNCE_DESCRIPTION_2: That is why I appreciate you taking your time to denounce this word '${1}' and thus be able to take corrective measures.
COMMENTS_PLACEHOLDER: I appreciate if you give me a brief explanation of the complaint to take the appropriate measures
DENOUNCE_SENT_DESCRIPTION: Thank you for your time. I will review it and take the necessary measures to correct this problem.
